headline: Trump’s Vitriol Toward Powell Was Met at Fed With ‘Ugh Ugh’
abstract: Internal emails show that Federal Reserve leaders emailed around an article in which a Republican senator defended the chair.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump’s nonstop attacks on the Federal Reserve have raised eyebrows and broken with recent presidential norms. But an Aug. 23 tweet in which Mr. Trump called the Fed chair, Jerome H. Powell, an “enemy” of America appears to have prompted some hand-wringing inside the central bank.
